definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Sciatica resolves on its own in three weeks in 75% of cases.
sentences.chinese: 75%的坐骨神经痛会在三周内不治而愈。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of electrical acupuncture on ischiodynia of cold-dampness type.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察电热针治疗寒湿型坐骨神经痛的疗效。

sentences.english: The differential diagnosis of sciatica of nerve roots and nerve trunk.
sentences.chinese: 根性及干性坐骨神经痛的鉴别。

sentences.english: Left sciatic nerves were cut down on germfree conditions and given primary suture of epineurium.
sentences.chinese: 无菌条件下切断左侧坐骨神经，一期神经外膜缝合。
我妈的坐骨神经痛又犯了。

sentences.english: Each rat underwent right sciatic nerve transection.
sentences.chinese: 显露每只动物的右侧坐骨神经，利刀横断。

sentences.english: L4- Prostate gland, muscles of the lower back, sciatic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺，下背部肌肉，坐骨神经。
坐骨神经痛通常在分娩后就会消失。

sentences.english: The experimental models that transected sciatic nerve in rats with proximal simple blind tube.
sentences.chinese: 采用切断大鼠坐骨神经近端套接单盲管的实验模型。

sentences.english: Summary: Sciatic nerve injury associated with acetabular fractures has been reported in most series.
sentences.chinese: 髋臼骨折并发坐骨神经损伤已经被广为报道。
掌握坐骨神经痛的定义。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the expression of clilary neurotrophic factor (CNTF) in the lesioned Sciatic nerve of rat.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索大鼠坐骨神经损伤后CNTF的表达和变化。

sentences.english: In this study, The Xi-Acupoint were verified effects to treat the sciatic pain.
sentences.chinese: 在本研究上郄穴治疗坐骨神经方面疼痛疗效获得验证。

sentences.english: And compression of lower sacral nerve roots produces pain unlike that of sciatica.
sentences.chinese: 低位的骶神经受压产生疼痛，和坐骨神经痛是不同的。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of toad venom on the electrophysiological character of toads' sciatic nerves.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察蟾酥对蟾蜍坐骨神经电生理特性的影响。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals

pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1

definition: ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
